mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE "boardCode", BOARD_NAME "boardName" FROM "BOARD_TYPE" ORDER BY BOARD_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, READ_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" c WHERE m.BOARD_NO=c.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" l WHERE l.BOARD_NO = m.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE <1 / 24 / 60-- 1분 전에 작성한 경우 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60)|| '초 전' --하루를 초단위로 환산한 것
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE <1 / 24 -- 1시간 전에 작성한 경우 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 )|| '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE <1 -- 하루 전에 작성한 경우 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24)|| '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_WRITE_DATE
FROM "BOARD" m JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
